flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: The shell on itsnback is just skinnthat has cooledfand hardened. Itnbreaks easily withna slight touch.
Its brittle shellnoccasionallynspouts intensefflames that cir­nculate throughoutnits body.
Its body is as hotnas lava and isnalways billowing.fFlames willnoccasionally burstnfrom its shell.

MAGCARGO’s shell is actually its skinnthat hardened as a result of cooling.nIts shell is very brittle and fragile -fjust touching it causes it to crumblenapart. This POKéMON returns to itsnoriginal size by dipping itself in magma.

MAGCARGO’s body temperature isnapproximately 18,000 degrees F.nWater is vaporized on contact.fIf this POKéMON is caught in the rain,nthe raindrops instantly turn intonsteam, cloaking the area in a thick fog.
The shell on its back is made of hardenednmagma. Tens of thousands of years spentnliving in volcanic craters have turnednMAGCARGO’s bodies into magma.
Its brittle shell occasionally spoutsnintense flames that circulate throughoutnits body.
The shell on its back is just skin thatnhas cooled and hardened. It breaks easilynwith a slight touch.
Its body temperature is roughlyn18,000 degrees F. Flames spoutnfrom gaps in its hardened shell.
Its body temperature is roughlyn18,000 degrees F. Flames spoutnfrom gaps in its hardened shell.

The shell on its back is just skinnthat has cooled and hardened. Itnbreaks easily with a slight touch.
Its brittle shell occasionallynspouts intense flames that ncirculate throughout its body.
Sa température corporelle avoisinenles 10 000 °C. Des flammes fusentndes fissures de sa coquille.
Its body temperature is roughlyn18,000 degrees F. Flames spoutnfrom gaps in its hardened shell.

Its body temperature is roughlyn18,000 degrees F. Flames spoutnfrom gaps in its hardened shell.
せなかの　カラは　くずれやすいがnときどき　たいないを　めぐっているnこうねつの　ほのおが　ふきだす。
등껍질은 깨어지기 쉬우며n가끔 체내를 순환하고 있는n고열의 불꽃을 뿜어낸다.
Sa coquille, très fragile, projette régulièrementndes flammes qui circulent dans son corps.
Aus seinem porösen Schneckengehäuse sprudelnnFeuerfontänen, die seinen Körper durchfluten.
En ocasiones, su resbaladiza concha lanza intensasnllamaradas que recorren todo su cuerpo.
A volte intense fiamme partono dal fragile guscio enavvolgono tutto il suo corpo.
Its brittle shell occasionally spouts intense flamesnthat circulate throughout its body.
背中の　殻は　崩れやすいがnときどき　体内を　巡っているn高熱の　炎が　噴き出す。
からだは　いつも　なみうっていてnようがんのように　あつい。nときどき　カラから　ひのこがもれる。
몸이 항상 일렁이고 있으며n용암처럼 뜨겁다.n때때로 껍데기에서 불티가 샌다.
Son corps en ébullition est aussi chaud que de lanlave. Des flammes sortent de sa coquille.
Sein Körper ist heißer als Lava und wogt stets.nManchmal schießen Flammen aus seinem Haus.
Tiene un cuerpo que no deja de hincharse y tanncaliente como la lava. La concha suelta llamas.
Il corpo caldo come lava è sempre in ebollizione.nA volte si vedono fiammate uscire dal guscio.
Its body is as hot as lava and is always billowing.nFlames will occasionally burst from its shell.
体は　いつも　波打っていてn溶岩のように　熱い。nときどき　殻から　火の粉が漏れる。
カラは　ひふが　ひえて　かたまった　もの。nさわった　だけで　ボロボロと　くずれて　しまう。nマグマに　はいると　もとの　おおきさに　もどる。
껍질은 피부가 식어 굳어진 것이다.n만지기만 해도 산산이 부서져 버린다.n마그마에 들어가면 원래 크기로 돌아온다.

La carapace de Volcaropod est en fait constituée de sa peau,nqui s’est durcie après un refroidissement. Elle est très cassantenet fragile. Il suffit de la toucher pour qu’elle casse. Il reprendnsa forme en plongeant dans le magma.

Magcargos Schale ist eigentlich seine Haut, die erhärtetnist, als es auskühlte. Seine Schale ist sehr spröde undnzerbrechlich. Schon bei einer leichten Berührung bricht sienauseinander. Dann muss es ein Bad in Magma nehmen.

La coraza de Magcargo es en realidad su propia piel quenquedó endurecida al enfriarse. Está muy resquebrajada y esnmuy frágil; se desharía solo con tocarla. Este Pokémon debensumergirse en magma para recuperar su forma.

La corazza di Magcargo è formata dalla sua pelle induritasinper effetto del raffreddamento. La corazza è fragile e friabile:ncade a pezzi al minimo contatto. Riacquista le sue dimensioninnormali immergendosi nel magma.

Magcargo’s shell is actually its skin that hardened as a resultnof cooling. Its shell is very brittle and fragile—just touching itncauses it to crumble apart. This Pokémon returns to its originalnsize by dipping itself in magma.
カラは　皮膚が　冷えて　固まった　もの。n触った　だけで　ボロボロと　崩れて　しまう。nマグマに　入ると　元の　大きさに　戻る。
たいおんが　やく１まんども　あるので　あまつぶにnうたれると　じょうきが　もうもうと　たちこめてnあたりは　ふかい　きりに　おおわれると　いう。
체온이 약 1만 도나 돼서 빗방울이n몸에 닿으면 수증기가 자욱하게 피어나n주변이 깊은 안개에 둘러싸인다고 한다.
La température de Volcaropod est d’environ 10 000 °C.nL’eau s’évapore à son contact. Si ce Pokémon se retrouvensous la pluie, les gouttes d’eau forment de la vapeur etncouvrent la zone de brouillard.

Magcargos Körpertemperatur liegt bei etwa 10 000 °C.nDieses Pokémon bringt Wasser sofort zum Verdampfen.nWenn dieses Pokémon im Regen steht, werden die Tropfennaugenblicklich zu Dampf und es entsteht dichter Nebel.

Magcargo tiene una temperatura corporal de 1000 °Cnaproximadamente. El agua se evapora al contacto con él.nSi llueve, las gotas que le rozan se transforman en vapor alninstante y crean una densa niebla.
La temperatura corporea di Magcargo si aggira attornonai 10.000 °C. A contatto col suo corpo l’acqua diventa vaporenall’istante. In caso di pioggia la zona circostante è invasa danuna fitta nebbia.

Magcargo’s body temperature is approximatelyn18,000 degrees Fahrenheit. Water is vaporized on contact.nIf this Pokémon is caught in the rain, the raindrops instantlynturn into steam, cloaking the area in a thick fog.
体温が　約１万度も　あるので　雨粒にn打たれると　蒸気が　もうもうと　立ち込めてnあたりは　深い　霧に　覆われると　いう。
